english: Choir singing requiem nur die ganzen fetzen , nicht das gemuese .
chinese: 唱诗班演唱安魂曲只挖完整的部分

english: It is your requiem mass , boy
chinese: 你的安魂曲已经奏响了，小子

english: It is your requiem mass , boy
chinese: 你的安魂曲已经奏响了，小子

english: But mozart had been right in his premonition : he had written his own requiem
chinese: 莫扎特的预感是对的：他写下了自己的安魂曲。
安魂曲造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: If the poor abb had not been in such a hurry , he might have had his requiem .
chinese: 要是这可怜的神甫不是走得这么匆忙，他是可以听到安魂曲的。 ”

english: Dark feather covered my eyes , i cachinnated and walked away after a while , with singing a reqiuem softly
chinese: 黑色的羽毛盖上了我的眼睛，我突然大笑，过了一会儿我哼著安魂曲离开。

english: Child in paradise follows in the same grim , doleful tone as requiem , but is much more shaded , subtle
chinese: 《天国的孩子》延续了《安魂曲》大气、严酷、悲伤沉郁的风格，但是更朦胧，情感更细腻。

english: In addition , several classical chorus works , operas and the essence of requiem in whizkid ' s short life are elaborately picked
chinese: 除此之外，更精心挑选数首神童短暂一生中的经典合唱作品以及歌剧、安魂曲选粹。

english: Of the stories told about mozart , the most famous is probably that surrounding his composition of the requiem , his last work
chinese: 有关莫扎特的故事中，最著名的可能就是围绕他创作最后一部作品《安魂曲》的情况了。

english: Convinced that this was what he was writing - - - and that he was living on borrowed time to do it - - - mozart worked feverishly
chinese: 莫扎特狂热地工作著，自认为他所写的就是他自己的安魂曲? ?他是依靠借来的时间来完成这个任务的。

english: “ and i was speaking the words of these four men talking about what was like to look for the bodies of their sons in the rubble
chinese: 我在表演当四位父亲在碎石堆中寻找他们儿子的尸体时的谈话，而我身后是华盛顿交响乐团演奏的莫扎特的安魂曲。

english: The royal melbourne philharmonic revisited verdi ' s grandiose and taxing messa da requiem after five years and again enjoyed another clear success … … .
chinese: 皇家墨尔本爱乐乐团五年之后重新演绎的威尔第的《安魂曲》很明显的又是一个巨大成功。

english: Mrvica ' s masterful rendition of giuseppe verdi ' s requiem is representative of the album ' s ethos : grand , unrelenting , and tragically climactic
chinese: 马克西姆对居塞比?威尔第《安魂曲》的精湛重演奠定了整张专辑的格调：华丽、狂嚣，以悲情为高潮。
